item.title: Setting Up Home With Hugo
item.description: Captain’s Log Cleared the path for moving to Hugo Basically just wiped out all the files in a new branch, draft. Followed the getting started tutorial Instructions as seen at http://web.archive.org/web/20231230084934/https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ With some modifications: 1. hugo new site home-hugo 1. hugo new content posts/setting-up-home-with-hugo.md (This doc) Publishing Configured publishDir = '..' to publish static content to the root directory ran hugo and pushed. From the project root you can do something like (cd home-hugo/; hugo)
